name: CS124's Nightmare (Arthur's Nightmare Mod)
description:
NOTE: This is my first Arthur's Nightmare Mod.

Credits to CS124 for the Sprites and the Sounds.

Programs used:

UABE, UnityEX, Paint.net and Audacity.

DISCLAIMER AND WARNING: This game contains, loud noises, jumpscares, and Scary content. and, I do not own those sounds.

CS124's Basics and Arthur's Nightmare is owned by: ClassicSonic124 and Varun R..
